Pollen Count

A brief overview of the pollen risk for the current day

Rating is given as follows:

Low = Low Pollen Risk - Little to no precautions needed for those with Hay Fever

Medium = Medium Pollen Risk - Some precautions needed for those with Hay Fever

High = High Pollen Risk - Precautions needed for those with Hay Fever
